Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.component.layout

Class Scroll<T extends Component & Scroll.Scrollable>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.component.Component
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.component.layout.Scroll<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the scrollable component.
public class Scroll<T extends Component & Scroll.Scrollable> extends Component
A component that allows for scrolling of another component.

The Scroll component will take up all the space available to it. The scrollable (aka the child) component is allowed to take up as much space as it wants. Scroll will then clip the scrollable component to fit within its own dimensions.

The scrollable component will be drawn at the offset specified in the constructor. The offset is relative to the center of the Scroll component and the anchor of the scrollable component. This means that if the offset is 0,0 then the anchor point of the scrollable component will be at the center of the Scroll component.
